title: Summer Game Fest 2024 Details Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.13.24

00:10:03 - Housekeeping
 - A new Gamescast is up and it’s our GOTY so far! Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - The Mix and Kinda Funny have teamed up for the Spring Game Showcase! 60 indies will strut their stuff FRIDAY at 10 am PT (that’s the usual KFGD time). Come watch on our channels, the mix channels, IGN, or GameSpot!
 - KFGD on Friday is at at noon
 - Game Showdown is going down right after at 1pm.
